Title: Oyebanji not sponsoring Tinubu’s endorsements – Committee
Summary: The President Bola Tinubu and Governor Biodun Oyebanji Statewide Endorsement Committee has denied that Governor Oyebinji of Ekiti State  not sponsoring Tinubus’s endorsements – Committee .

Title: PWDs receive mobility aids from NDDC in Bayelsa
Summary: Some persons with disability have received mobility aids from the Niger Delta Development Commission, NDDC . The commission’s Managing Director, Dr Samuel Ogbuku, spoke at an awareness programme organised for people with disabilities .

Title: Residents flee Zamfara communities after death of two suspected bandits
Summary: Residents flee Zamfara communities after death of two suspected bandits . Residents flee surrounding villages over fears of reprisal attacks . Two suspected bandits killed by local security forces in Gusau Local Government Area . Security analyst and counterinsurgency expert, Zagazola Makama, disclosed

Title: Bala Mohammed slams PDP members in opposition coalition
Summary: Bauchi State Governor Bala Mohammed slams PDP members in opposition coalition . He described their dual loyalty as political double-dealing and an aberration . Mohammed spoke in Abuja on Wednesday .

Title: Wrestling legend Hulk Hogan dead at 71 -US media
Summary: Wrestling legend Hulk Hogan has died at the age of 71, US media reports . Hogan parlayed his prowess in the ring into an acting career . Hogan — known for his towering 6’7″″″ – was the iconic face of professional wrestling in the 1980s .

Title: NGML boosts gas supply by 44MMscf/d, signs deal with CCETC Suk power
Summary: NNPC Gas Marketing Limited (NGML) has signed a landmark Natural Gas Sale and Purchase Agreement (GSPA) with CCETC Suk Power Limited . The deal will facilitate delivery of up to 44 million standard cubic feet per day (MMscf/d) of natural gas .

Title: Senate adjourns plenary till Sept 23
Summary: The Senate President, Godswill Akpabio, said the adjournment marked the end of the current legislative year . The Minority Leader, Sen. Abba Moro (PDP-Benue), said that the adjourned .

Title: Usyk ordered to face Parker in heavyweight defence
Summary: Oleksandr Usyk ordered by WBO to face Joseph Parker in mandatory heavyweight title defence . New Zealander Parker is the current holder of the WBO world heavyweight title .

Title: Terrorism, climate change, cyber threats deepening Nigeria’s security woes – CDS Musa
Summary: The Chief of Defence Staff (CDS), General Christopher Musa, has warned that terrorism, climate change, cyber threats, and geopolitical tensions are intensifying global fragility and worsening Nigeria’s already complex security challenges .

Title: I’m senior to Pete Edochie in acting – Yemi Solade
Summary: Yemi Solade asserted that Yoruba film industry laid the foundation for what is now recognised as Nollywood . Solade said the Yoruba industry paved the way for Nollywood, which is recognised as 'Nollywood' The actress said she is senior to Pete Edochie in acting .

Title: Senate begins annual recess, to resume September 23
Summary: The Senate adjourned plenary proceedings till September 23, 2025, to proceed on its annual recess . Senate President, Godswill Akpabio, said the move was in line with “chamber reciprocity” as members of the House of Representatives had also proceeded on break in accordance with the legislative calendar . Title: PDP govs vow to confront APC, coalition ahead of 2027
Summary: Governors elected on the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party have declared their readiness, alongside party members, to confront both the ruling All Progressives Congress and the emerging coalition led by the African Democratic Congress in the upcoming elections . Several high-profile politicians have defected to the ADC-led coalition, including former Vice President Atiku Abubak

Title: 2027: PDP chair predicts collapse of opposition coalition
Summary: The PDP has expressed confidence in the eventual collapse of the opposition coalition ahead of the 2027 presidential election . The party’s Acting National Chairman, Umar Damagum, described the PDP as a strong and united platform ready to reclaim power in 2027 . On July 1, the African Democratic Congress was adopted as the

Title: Bauchi begins well chlorination to combat cholera outbreak
Summary: The Bauchi State Government has commenced a well chlorination exercise in the state . The State Environmental Protection Agency, BASEPA, has commenced the operation . BASEPA Director Muhammad Usman stressed that the agency is prioritising professionalism to safeguard human lives .

Title: Teachers' strike: FCTA extends school term till August 29
Summary: Federal Capital Territory Administration has approved a five-week extension of the 2024/2025 third term academic calendar for public primary schools in Abuja, following the prolonged strike action by the Nigeria Union of Teachers . The extended school term is expected to help stabilise the academic calendar and ensure that affected pupils receive adequate learning time before the next academic
